item.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18730)
item.content:encoded:
blm5280 - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=blm5280&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Holistic Heaux is in Minneapolis, Minnesota.We are collecting community support for the mother of Daunte's son. She...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Holistic Heaux is in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

We are collecting community support for the mother of Daunte's son. She has personally requested this help and we are here to amplify her needs. Please share an...d spread the word for those who want to help. May Daunte Rest In Love. Let's come together to help who he's left behind. üß°

Image description:

How to Support Daunte Wright's Son and Girlfriend

Daunte Wright was murdered by Brooklyn Center Police on 4/11. He leaves behind the mother of his child, Chyna, and his soon to be 2 year-old-son, Daunte Jr.

Holistic Heaux has been in contact with Daunte Wrights' girlfriend. We are rallying support for her and their son.

Items:
Diaper
Size 4
18-24 Month clothes
Shoes size 6
Groceries
Gift cards

Monetary donations:
Cash App: $hubby98 (Chyna's direct Cash App)
Venmo: @thuy-jones (Will pass to Chyna)
PayPal: @holisticheaux (Will pass to Chyna)

Drop-Off Location
Please message @HolisticHeaux for address on facebook or instagram

See More

item.title: ‚ÄúDaunte was tragically shot and killed by Minneapolis police...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúDaunte was tragically shot and killed by Minneapolis police today on a traffic stop .I am Dauntes aunt Kelly I set up this page to take the burden off my sister Katie Wright and brother in law Aubrey Wright as they are grieving the loss of there 20 year old son..Please donate to give Daunte the proper burial he deserves and if you can't help please send lots of prayers for our family to get through this tragic loss thank you and God bless‚Äù

#JusticeForDaunteWright #SayHisName #BlackLivesMatter #MutualAid #DaunteWright

https://www.gofundme.com/f/dauntes-funeral-and-burial-cost

Daunte was tragically shot and killed by Minneapolis police today on a traffic stop .I am‚Ä¶ Kelly Bryant needs your support for Dauntes Funeral and Burial cost

item.title: Say his name. #DaunteWright Rest in power. You were so...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Say his name. #DaunteWright

Rest in power.

You were so young.

...

You had so much life left to live.

Your son had countless memories left to make with you.

Peace and comfort to your family.

#NoJusticeNoPeace

See MoreJane Simons

Today üíîüíîüíî
Another senseless murder by police..
In Minnesota..
and another child without a father

...

during the Chauvin trial no less
When will it stop. ü•∫ü•µ

‚ÄúThis is #DaunteWright and his son Daunte Wright Jr.

Earlier today Daunte Sr. was shot to death during a traffic stop reportedly about an air freshener obstructing a mirror.

He was 20 years old and killed by a Brooklyn Center Police Officer in MN. He was unarmed.‚Äù
They left him in the street for 6-8 hours
#BlackLivesMatter #DaunteWright #SayHisName

item.title: #SAAM2021 #BLM5280SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#SAAM2021 #BLM5280SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen #ProtectBlackWomenAtAllCosts

Black Women's Blueprint

In recognition of Black Maternal Health Week and Sexual Assault Awareness Month, join us this coming Monday for an important webinar. We will provide insights a...bout how rape culture shows up in our programs and institutions, hindering women's access to trauma-informed services and reproductive health care and the correlation to maternal mortality. We will lay out a framework, model and tools developed by Black Women's Blueprint for public health, medical professionals, reproductive justice and sexual assault prevention advocates to radically shift the current paradigms.
Link in BWB's bio to register.
*
*
*
#SAAM21 #endsexualassault #blackmaternalhealth #reproductivejustice #BMHW21 #blackmamasmatter

See More

item.title: #SAAM2021 #BLM5280SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen #BelieveWomen
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#SAAM2021 #BLM5280SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen #BelieveWomen

Morgan Rene'e

Dear Survivor, üíô

NEVER forget how strong you are.
Remember you did EVERYTHING you could to survive that moment.ü§ûüèæ

...

It‚Äôs ok if you‚Äôre angry, it‚Äôs ok if it happened a long time ago and it‚Äôs ok if you don‚Äôt know if you‚Äôll ever ‚Äúbe over it.‚Äù‚è≥

Remember, It is NOT your fault. You ARE strong. You ARE worthy of love. You ARE BELIEVED. What doesn‚Äôt kill you makes you stronger. üì∂

I love you, I believe you, I support you and you are not alone. üíï

With Love,
Another Survivor ü¶ã

#SexualAssultAwarenessMonth #SAAM #WomenEmpowerment #MenToo #MeTooMovement #NoMeansNo #ConsentIsSexy #SupportSurvivors #BelieveSurvivors

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Liberal Jane Illustrationüñ§ Young parents deserve our trust and support, not shame and stigma. Let‚Äôs talk about...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Liberal Jane Illustration

üñ§ Young parents deserve our trust and support, not shame and stigma.

Let‚Äôs talk about ‚Äòyoung parent‚Äô stigma - the idea that those expecting or parenting under t...he age of 25 are inferior or unworthy of our trust, support and resources. Pregnant and parenting young people are often seen as society‚Äôs ‚Äúfailures,‚Äù ‚Äúunfit caregivers‚Äù and ‚Äúbad‚Äù influences on other youth - which is simply not true.

Young parents are human, and they have the power and autonomy to make decisions about their own reproductive lives and health ‚Äì which includes: if they want to carry a pregnancy or choose to have an abortion.

Justice for young parents is reproductive justice.

[Digital illustration of a young family, including a mom with long curly hair, a pink sweatshirt, and beige jeans. She‚Äôs holding a toddler, who has their hair in pigtails, a pink flower cardigan and solid pink pants. On the right is another child who has their hair up back in buns, a purple overall dress, polka dot leggings, and a leg prosthetic. The text reads, ‚Äòyoung parents deserve support, not shame‚Äô]

At this point, I really only have one question for police officers across the nation: Why are you like this?

item.title: ‚ÄúPeople come and say, ‚ÄòBlack people are still here?‚Äô and...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúPeople come and say, ‚ÄòBlack people are still here?‚Äô and we say, ‚ÄòYes, we are still here,'‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúNone of us were surprised about any of the feedback that has come. It‚Äôs important that people understand the history of this area and the culture of this area is Black. It is rooted in Blackness. Black excellence.‚Äù

https://www.denverpost.com/‚Ä¶/denver-five-points-black-wome‚Ä¶/

When 20 women gathered for a picture last month in Denver‚Äôs historic Five Points neighborhood it renewed energy in an area that was hit hard by the pandemic and racial injustice.

denverpost.com

How a picture of 20 Black women inspired a Denver neighborhood

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org
